response.original_title: 関西ジャニーズＪｒ．の京都太秦行進曲！
response.overview: Masato Mimura aspires to be a star one day, but the only entertainment gig he can get is a part-time job as a character in a costume show. Masato soon meets a young man named Susumu Teruyuki, who invites him to join Kyoto’s Uzumasa Action Gym.  Masato spends his time doing day-to-day chores while he and his colleagues all chase the same dream. One day, they’re given the opportunity to appear with actor Shido Nakamura in a new adaptation of “Tange Sazen”.
response.title: Kansai Johnny’s Jr. no Kyoto Uzumasa Koshinkyoku!
